Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Small Business.

Items.Title: Oversight - Preparing Asylum Seekers and Migrants for the Workforce.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Preparing Asylum Seekers and Migrants for the Workforce.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Small Business
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enhancing the IDNYC application process
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) and the Secretary of Homeland Security to grant humanitarian parole, of at least two years, to asylum seekers who entered the United States prior to the date this parole is announced.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: United States Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) and the Secretary of Homeland Security to grant humanitarian parole, of at least two years, to asylum seekers who entered the United States prior to the date this parole is announced.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on United States Citizenship and Immigration Services to quickly clear the backlog of I-765 applications for employment authorization.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: United States Citizenship and Immigration Services to quickly clear the backlog of I-765 applications for employment authorization.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.5964/A.8263, also known as the Empire State Licensing Act, which provides all New Yorkers with access to professional, occupational, commercial, or business licenses, permits, certificates, or related registrations regardless of an applicant's citizenship or immigration status, or lack thereof
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
